sourcesContent:
import { Image } from '@chakra-ui/image'
import { Badge, Box, Divider, Flex, HStack, Link, Stack, Text } from '@chakra-ui/layout'
import React, { memo, useCallback, VFC, useState } from 'react'
import { useHistory } from 'react-router'
import { BsHeartFill } from "react-icons/bs";

const AnimeCard = () => {
    const [ color, setColor ] = useState(false)
    const handleColor = () => {
        setColor(!color)
    }

    return (
        <>
            <Link _hover={{opacity: 0.8}} >
                <Box w={{base: '300px', md: '500px'}} h={{base: '200px', md: '300px'}} bg='white' borderRadius='10px' m='15px 5px' p='0 0 10px 0' border='solid 1px #e0e0e0'　>
                    <Image bg='red' borderRadius='10px 10px 0 0' w='100%'　h='80%' objectFit='cover'/>
                    <Flex align='flex-start' m='5px 15px 0'>
                        <Text fontSize="xs">タイトル</Text>
                    </Flex>
                    <Stack ml='5px' spacing={1}>
                        <Text fontSize="md">テスト</Text>
                    </Stack>
                    <Flex justify='flex-end' mr={3} mt={-2} >
                        <Box onClick={handleColor}>
                            <BsHeartFill size='20px' color={color ? 'pink': 'gray'}/>
                        </Box>
                    </Flex>
                </Box>
            </Link>
        </>
    )
}

export default AnimeCard
